content.rendered:
The Salvage Association played a major role in the development of risk assessments condition surveys for the London marine insurance market.

In conjunction with the Joint Hull Committee at Lloyd’s Braemar SA were instrumental in the development of the JH2006 10A, B, C & D warranty surveys for underwriters.

AqualisBraemar SA continue to work with the Joint Hull Committee and have recently assisted in the development of a new fuel management risk assessment under the title of JH2013 007 A. At the inception of these surveys the JH2006 risks assessments we renamed JH2013 007 A, B, C & D. The JH 2013 007 C Risk Assessment survey involves auditing the owners ship management operation.
